pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: having too much fun (esp. in a red-light district, etc.) and missing work or neglecting one's duties

pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: staying in one place for a long time

lessons.japanese: タイタニック号は処女航海で沈没した。
lessons.english: The Titanic sunk on its maiden voyage.

lessons.japanese: 1912年、タイタニック号は処女航海中に沈没した。
lessons.english: It was in 1912 that the Titanic sank during her first voyage.

lessons.japanese: その船は出帆して２日後に沈没した。
lessons.english: The ship set sail only to sink two days later.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは沈没する船を見捨てた。
船は乗務員全員を乗せたまま沈没した。
lessons.english: The ship sank with all her crew on board.

lessons.japanese: 船が沈没してしまってのち、船の残骸が引き上げられた。
lessons.english: The wreckage of the ship was salvaged after it had gone to Davy Jones's locker.

lessons.japanese: タイタニック号は処女航海で沈没した。
lessons.english: The Titanic sunk on its maiden voyage.

lessons.japanese: その船は出帆して２日後に沈没した。
lessons.english: The ship set sail only to sink two days later.

lessons.japanese: 船が沈没してしまってのち、船の残骸が引き上げられた。
lessons.english: The wreckage of the ship was salvaged after it had gone to Davy Jones's locker.

lessons.japanese: 船は乗務員全員を乗せたまま沈没した。
lessons.english: The ship sank with all her crew on board.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは沈没する船を見捨てた。
